engineerstools.config.title: Engineer's Tools config
item.engineerstools.ariadne_coal.help:
Draw orientation arrows to find
 the way out of your mines. The
 arrow direction depends on where
 you click on the block to draw on.
item.engineerstools.charged_lapis.help:
Stores one Experience level.
Consume to retrieve the XP, this
also removes all active potion
effects and restores a fraction
of health. Created in a Mind
Squeezer.
item.engineerstools.charged_lapis_squeez:
Semi-occult device that creates
Charged Lapis from Lapis Lazuli
in your inventory by draining XP
levels from you. It will hurt a
bit, you may feel a bit dizzy.
The Charged Lapis can be stored
and consumed again to get the
level back.
Hmm, it doesn't work, no XP left?
item.engineerstools.crushing_hammer.help:
Manual handheld ore crushing
 hammer. Higher yield when manually
 crafting ore to grit in a crafting
 table. Has a low durability,
 and cannot be repaired. Almost no
 attack damage. Hit animals and
 villagers to gently push them, hit
 monsters to knock them back hard.
item.engineerstools.diving_capsule.help:
Helps when you're about to drown
 by automatically pushing a few
 air bubbles back. It just has to
 be somewhere in your inventory
 or Curios/Bauble slot. Note that
 the capsule air tank is limited.
item.engineerstools.gold_grit.help:
Can be smelted to gold ingots,
 but is not suitable for advanced
 material processing.
item.engineerstools.iron_grit.help:
Can be smelted to iron ingots,
 but is not suitable for advanced
 material processing.
item.engineerstools.material_box.help:
Simple storage box with shoulder
 belt to transport construction
 materials from A to B.
Shift-hover the box in your inventory
 to inspect. The GUI supports
 quick-move-all with smart
 placement (shift-ctrl-click).
 'Cactus-Drop' protection: When not
 empty, it withstands fire or cactus
 damage for about 10s.
item.engineerstools.musli_bar.help:
Nutritional quick snack, composed
 in a Muslee Bar Press of everything
 you can find, with seeds of course.
 People have a tendency to eat too
 much of it and too fast because
 it's healthy. Oh, and it's actually
 Müsli, not Muslee - but who cares.
item.engineerstools.musli_bar_press.help:
DIY on-the-go press for Muslee
 Melange Power Bars. Drop in some
 seeds and every food you can find
 (well, maybe no rotting stuff)
 to create healthy snacks.
item.engineerstools.redia_tool.help:
REal DIAmond covered steel multi
 tool. Combines axe, pickaxe,
 shovel, hoe, and shears. Efficient
 when in good condition, slow when
 durability is low. Repair with
 Diamonds (in your inventory, not
 an anvil). Over-repair to add
 Efficiency and Fortune.
 Right-click: Place torch.
 Sneak-right-click: Hoe Dirt to
 Farmland, Coarse Dirt, etc; Shear
 sheep, Vines, Leaves etc. Sneak
 while breaking a wood log: Tree
 felling.
Note: You really must over-repair
the tool by adding Diamonds in your
crafting grid to get Efficiency and
finally Fortune.
item.engineerstools.sleeping_bag.help:
Made of tough fabric, therefore
 weatherproof and very robust.
item.engineerstools.stimpack.help:
Helps when you're in big trouble
 by pushing a few hearts when
 health is low. Also gives you a
 small buff to get out of any
 present misery. Warning: The
 injection may have a delay. It
 just has to be somewhere in your
 inventory or Bauble slot.
item.engineerstools.tracker.help:
Helps to find friends and
 locations again. Click a block
 or entity with the device to
 track it. The built-in compass
 will then show the way. When you
 are close, the tracker also
 points up or down. When the
 target is not in your dimension
 or died, it will rotate 180
 degrees (the 'dot' position).
 To clear the current target,
 click straight down on the ground.
item.engineerstools.tracker.hint.clearfi: First click on the ground below you to clear the current tracking target.
engineerstools.book.landing_text: Tip in advance: To get a short tooltip help text for a block or device, press the CONTROL and SHIFT keys at the same time while hovering. That way you do not need to carry this heavy manual with you all the time.
engineerstools.book.name: Engineer's Tools
engineerstools.book.subtitle: Reference manual
